/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Parked along the side of the road are several cars, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the various colors of the cars.
